terminologie_extrait.contexte: referring to placement options for serving short

debutant.description: cuts off wide angles and forces receiver to choose between forehand and backhand receive
forces receiver to do a tricky forehand receive and often results in a crosscourt return
takes away some of the extreme crosscourt angle and makes it easier for receiver to get to the serve
cuts off wide angle to forehand and sets up for attack with backhand
similar to short to wide backhand but takes away some extreme crosscourt angle

exercices_complementaires.nom: short serves to middle and wide corners
exercices_complementaires.description: practice serves to different corners to develop precision and control

metriques_progression.description: practice each serve option multiple times to develop muscle memory and accuracy

erreurs_a_eviter.nom: leaving the ball too long in front of you
erreurs_a_eviter.description: make sure to stay close to the table and be prepared to attack or defend

erreurs_a_eviter.nom: not adjusting for different receiver styles
erreurs_a_eviter.description: practice against different receivers and adjust your serve accordingly
